violations.description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
violations.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-expanded="false"

violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

nodes.html: <button tabindex="0" onclick="CookieInformation.declineAllCategories()" aria-label="Avvis alle" id="declineButton" class="coi-banner__decline" role="alert" aria-atomic="true" style="display: flex;">Avvis alle</button>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role alert is not allowed for given element

violations.description: Ensure every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
violations.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: Privatkunde
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.04 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #69a333, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one banner landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one banner landmark

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly
